SA11sanss02u:1: evam eṣām ātmabhāvâdīnām utsṛṣṭānām api rakṣā kāryā /
SA11sanss02u:10: evaṃrūpayā śāriputra hitâiṣikatayā samanvāgato bodhisatvo jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karotîti //
SA11sanss02u:12: śakaṭam iva bhārôdvahanârthaṃ kevalaṃ dharmabuddhinā vāḍhavyam
SA11sanss02u:55: kalyāṇamitrânuśāsanīpratipannasya kulaputra bodhisatvasya buddhā bhagavanto 'bhirāddhacittā bhavanti /
SA11sanss02u:60: atâivâryasudhanaḥ sāradhvajasya bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasâbhivandyânekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkrṭya
SA11sanss02u:61: sāradhvajaṃ bhikṣum avalokya praṇipatya punaḥ punar avalokayan
SA11sanss02u:64: namasyann avanaman manasi kurvan cintayan bhāvayan
SA11sanss02u:66: guṇān abhimukhīkurvan nigamayann atra sann anusmaran dṛḍhīkurvann avijahan manasâgamayann upanibadhnan praṇidhiṃ samavasaran
SA11sanss02u:67: darśanam abhilaṣan svaranimittam udgṛhṇan yāvat tasyântikāt
SA11sanss02u:69: tathā kalyāṇamitrâgataṃ sarvajñatāṃ saṃpaśyann aśrumukho rudan yāvan meghasya dramitasyântikāt prakrāntaḥ //
SA11sanss02u:71: iha śāriputra bodhisatvo dharmakāmatayā nâsti tal loke
SA11sanss02u:74: nâsti tat kāyôpasthānaṃ yan na karoti /
SA11sanss02u:81: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyacchedāyâiṣa dharmaḥ saṃvartatae iti ratnacittam utpādya bhaiṣajyacittam
SA11sanss02u:87_0: kasyacid antikāc catuṣpādikāṃ gāthāṃ śṛṇuyād uddiśed vôdgṛhṇīyād dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāsaṃprayuktāṃ
SA11sanss02u:87_1: bodhisatvasaṃbhārôpacayaṃ vā tena tasminn ācārye dharmagauravaṃ karaṇīyaṃ yāvadbhir
SA11sanss02u:90: yadi tāvatâivaṃ kalpāṃs tasyâcāryasyôpasthānaparicaryāṃ kuryād aśaṭhatayā
SA11sanss02u:92: adyâpi gṛhapate na pratipūritam ācāryasyâcāryagauravaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss02u:95: kalyāṇamitreṣu ca tvayā kulaputra tīvraṃ gauravam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss02u:99: dhisatvo mahāsatvâivaṃrūpair guṇair gauravamanasikārair gacchann anupūrveṇânyatamanagaram
SA11sanss02u:102: yan nv aham imam ātmabhāvaṃ vikrīyânena mūlyena dharmodgatasya
SA11sanss02u:105: vikrītāni punar aparimāṇe saṃsāre 'parimāṇāni yāni mayā
SA11sanss02u:106: kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānam anubhūtāni na punar evaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśâivaṃrūpāṇāṃ vā satvānāṃ satkārāya //
SA11sanss02u:107: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'ntarāyaṇamadhyagataḥ śabdam udīrayām āsa ghoṣam anuśrāvayām
SA11sanss02u:110: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyān brāhmaṇagṛhapatikāṃs tathā
SA11sanss02u:111: samupasthāpayām āsa yathā taṃ ghoṣaṃ nâśrauṣuḥ /
SA11sanss02u:112: yadâtmanaḥ krāyakaṃ na labhate tadâikântaṃ gatvā
SA11sanss02u:113: prārodīd aśrūṇi ca prāvarttayad evaṃ câvadad /
SA11sanss02u:114: aho vatâsmākaṃ durlabhā lābhā ye vayam ātmabhāvasyâpi
SA11sanss02u:124: dharmapūjāṃ karttukāmaḥ so 'ham asya krāyakaṃ na labhe /
SA11sanss02u:126: atha khalu sa māṇavakaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam
SA11sanss02u:128: na mama kulaputra puruṣeṇa kṛtyam api tu khalu punaḥ pitur me yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ /
SA11sanss02u:129: tatra me puruṣasya hṛdayena kṛtyaṃ lohitena câsthimajjayā ca /
SA11sanss02u:132: lābhā me sulabdhāḥ pariniṣpannaṃ câtmānaṃ jāne
SA11sanss02u:134: yan mayâtmanaḥ krāyako labdho hṛdaysya rudhirasya câsthimajjāyāś ca //
SA11sanss02u:135: sa hṛṣṭacittaḥ kalyacittaḥ pramuditacittas taṃ māṇavakam etad avocat /
SA11sanss02u:136: dāsyāmi māṇavaka yena te itâtmabhāvād arthaḥ /
SA11sanss02u:137: yāvat sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ nisrāvayati sma
SA11sanss02u:138: dakṣiṇaṃ côruṃ viddhvā nirmāṃsaṃ ca kṛtvâsthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlam upasaṃkrāmati //
SA11sanss02u:140: atha khalv anyatarā śreṣṭhidārikôpariprāsādatalagatâdrākṣīt sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yāvat sā śreṣṭhidārikā
SA11sanss02u:142: kiṃ nu khalu tvaṃ kulaputrâivaṃrūpām ātmanaḥ kāraṇāṃ kārayāsîti /
SA11sanss02u:143: yāvat sā dārikā pūjāprayojanaṃ śrutvā punar āha /
SA11sanss02u:146: s te kulaputra tato guṇajātir niṣpatsyate /
SA11sanss02u:148: sa dārike kulaputro mama prajñāpāramitām upāyakauśalyaṃ côpadekṣayti /
SA11sanss02u:149: tatra vayaṃ śikṣiṣyāmas tatra vayaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvasatvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanss02u:151: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvam etad avocat /
SA11sanss02u:153: yāvad udārāḥ praṇītāś câmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrttitāḥ /
SA11sanss02u:157: tathôdārāḥ praṇītāś câmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrttitāḥ /
SA11sanss02u:158: api tu khalu kulaputra yena yena kṛtyaṃ tat te dāsyāmi suvarṇaṃ vā
SA11sanss02u:159: maṇiṃ vā muktāṃ vā vaiḍūryaṃ vā yāvad yena tvaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisatvaṃ satkariṣyasi /
SA11sanss02u:160: yāvad vistareṇa tayā dārikayā pañcaśataparivārayā sārddhaṃ tasya dharmodgatasya saṃkramaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ //
SA11sanss02u:161: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ utthāyâsanāt
SA11sanss02u:164: sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sapta varṣāṇi na kāmavitarkam
SA11sanss02u:166: na vyāpādavitarkaṃ na vihiṃsāvitarkam utpādayām āsa /
SA11sanss02u:170: kadā nāma dharmodgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vyutthāsyati /
SA11sanss02u:171: yad vayaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmâsanaṃ prajñāpayiṣyāmo yatrâsau kulaputro niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati taṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaṃ siktaṃ saṃmṛṣṭaṃ ca
SA11sanss02u:174: sadāpraruditasya bodhisatvasyânuśikṣamāṇāni dvābhyām evêryāpathābhyāṃ kālam atināmayām āsuḥ //
SA11sanss02u:175: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvo divyaṃ nirghoṣam
SA11sanss02u:176: aśrauṣīd itaḥ saptame divase dharmodgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'smāt samādher vyutthāya madhye nagarasya niṣadya
SA11sanss02u:179_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvâttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ
SA11sanss02u:179_1: prītisaumanasyajātas taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ śodhayām āsa sārddhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhaiḥ
SA11sanss02u:179_2: pañcabhir dārikāśatair dharmâsanaṃ prajñapayām āsa saptaratnamayaṃ /
SA11sanss02u:180: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ sektukāmaś ca /
SA11sanss02u:181: na côdakaṃ samantāt paryeṣamāṇo 'pi labhate yena taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ siñced /
SA11sanss02u:182: yathâpi nāma māreṇa pāpīyasā tat sarvam udakam antardhāpitaṃ apy eva nāmâsyôdakam alabhamānasya cittaṃ duṣkhitaṃ syād daurmanasyaṃ ca bhavec cittasya vânyathātvaṃ bhaved yenâsya
SA11sanss02u:183: kuśalamūlântardhānaṃ bhaven na vā bhrājeran kuśalamūlāni /
SA11sanss02u:184: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyâitad abhūt /
SA11sanss02u:185: yan nv aham ātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhvêmaṃ pradeśaṃ rudhireṇa
SA11sanss02u:189: mā rajodhātur ito dharmodgatasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya kāye
SA11sanss02u:192: varaṃ khalu punar mamâyaṃ kāyâivaṃrūpayā kriyayā vinaśyatu
SA11sanss02u:198: yadi punar bhidyante kāmam evaṃrūpeṣv iva dharmasthāneṣu
SA11sanss02u:200: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvêti pratisaṃkhyāya
SA11sanss02u:203: ntato viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svarudhireṇa sarvam asiñcat /
SA11sanss02u:205: na ca sadāprarudito bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya tāsāṃ vā
SA11sanss02u:209: kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣavo bodhisatvena mahāsatvena yāvajjīvaṃ na
SA11sanss02u:211: tad evaṃ kalyāṇamitrânutsargād ātmabhāvâdīnāṃ rakṣâdikaṃ kāryaṃ //
SA11sanss02u:212: sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadêkṣaṇād bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni hi prāyaḥ
SA11sanss02u:214: teṣu teṣu sūtrânteṣu bodhisatvasamudācārā bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni prajñaptānîti vacanāt /
SA11sanss02u:215: tasmāt tadanīkṣaṇe mā bhūd āpattim āpannasyâpy ajñānād aviratir iti sadā sūtradarśanāyâdaraḥ kāryaḥ /
SA11sanss02u:216: tad anena kalyāṇamitrânutsargeṇa sūtrântadarśanena ca sarvaḥ
SA11sanss02u:219: yābhir akṣaraniruktibhiḥ so 'nabhilāpyo dharmaḥ sūcyate tāsām
SA11sanss02u:222: punar aparaṃ kulaputra ye te dharmabhāṇakâiṣām
SA11sanss02u:224: teṣām api dharmabhāṇakānāṃ yat sevanaṃ bhajanaṃ paryupāsanam
SA11sanss02u:235: adharme dharmavādināṃ ca pudgalānāṃ saha dharmeṇa nigrahaḥ /
SA11sanss02u:240: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yo dharmaśravaṇahetuko vā
SA11sanss02u:245: tasya yā nivāraṇā parirakṣâikâgrībhāvo damaḥ śamôpaśamo vinayo 'yam ucyate saddharmaparigrahaḥ /
SA11sanss02u:247: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yena dharmeṇa yo 'dharmaḥ pravartate tasya
SA11sanss02u:253: na śuddhir na vṛddhis [[DOUBT]] tataś ca so 'pi na bodhisatvêty avaśyakāryaḥ saddharmaparigrahaḥ //
SA11sanss02u:261: syād yathâpi nāma devi mahābalavato 'pi puruṣasyâlpo 'pi
SA11sanss02u:264: evam eva devi mārasya pāpīyasaḥ parītto 'pi saddharmaparigraho-
SA11sanss02u:266: vedhanīyo bhavati śokâvahaḥ paridevakaraś ca bhavati /
SA11sanss02u:267: nâhaṃ devi anyam ekam api dharmaṃ kuśalaṃ samanupaśyāmi mārasya
SA11sanss02u:273: syād yathâpi nāma devi sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvān
SA11sanss02u:274: kulaparvatān abhibhavann abhirocate ca samabhirocate côccatvena
SA11sanss02u:276: evam eva devi mahāyānikasya kāyajīvitanirapekṣasya na ca
SA11sanss02u:281: parigṛhīto bhavatī jinebhir devebhi nāgebhi ca kinnarebhiḥ /
SA11sanss02u:286: sarvatra jātau ca jinaṃ sa paśyati /
SA11sanss02u:287: dṛṣṭvā ca tasmiṃl labhate prasādaṃ saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām //
SA11sanss02u:298: śakro 'tha brahmā tatha lokapāl-o manuṣyarājā bhuvi cakravarttī /
SA11sanss02u:306: na tasya saṃmuhyati bodhi cittaṃ na côddhuraḥ pāramitā carīṣu /
